verbs.description: With latest court decision , DACA [V: is] fully revived ; President Trump should declare it a victory and walk away .
With latest court decision , [ARG1: DACA] is [ARGM-EXT: fully] [V: revived] ; President Trump should declare it a victory and walk away .
With latest court decision , DACA is fully revived ; President Trump [V: should] declare it a victory and walk away .
With latest court decision , DACA is fully revived ; [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: declare] [ARG1: it a victory] and walk away .
With latest court decision , DACA is fully revived ; [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: should] declare it a victory and [V: walk] [ARGM-DIR: away] .
